text: Hoffmannola is a genus of air-breathing sea slugs, a shell-less marine pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Onchidiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Hoffmannola include: * Hoffmannola hansi Ev. Marcus & Er. Marcus, 1967 * Hoffmannola lesliei (Stearns, 1892) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Onchidiidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Hoffmannola
